item.title: About me
item.description: Hi, there! Using these pages to document the loot of my adventures and expeditions. What they will be, that is too early to say. 10 things I love My kids to bits and Pia, their mother, because the only thing that matters Data and statistics because of the beauty it beholds Keyboard mastery and Emacs training as they represent the forgotten art of powerful steep learning curve UX. I think Slide presentations because they have been misunderstood and abused for too long Jokes, much like unexpected novel ideas, art or philosophy.
